field.description: Select the interface to enable for the TeamSpeak 3 server.
Check this box to allow this package to add firewall rules. This allows the TeamSpeak 3 clients to connect to the server running on this host.

Additional TeamSpeak 3 configuration options can be added or changed here. Please check the TeamSpeak 3 forum (<a href=\"\" target=\"_blank\">http://forum.teamspeak.com/forum.php<a>) for all available options.
